            • Method Detail

              • java.util.List<D> aggregate(java.util.List pipeline, com.mongodb.AggregationOptions options = AggregationOptions.builder()

                Execute a MongoDB aggregation pipeline. Note that the pipeline should return documents that represent this domain class as each return document will be converted to a domain instance in the result set

                Parameters:
                pipeline - The pipeline
                options - The options (optional)
                Returns:
                A mongodb result list

              • java.util.List<D> aggregate(java.util.List pipeline, com.mongodb.AggregationOptions options, com.mongodb.ReadPreference readPreference)

                Execute a MongoDB aggregation pipeline. Note that the pipeline should return documents that represent this domain class as each return document will be converted to a domain instance in the result set

                Parameters:
                pipeline - The pipeline
                options - The options (optional)
                Returns:
                A mongodb result list
